WÃ¤lti is a one-of-a-kind midfielder. She knows she wonâ€™t be winning the Ballon dâ€™Or like Aitana BonmatÃ­, but she always gives her best and offers her 100%.

Arsenal need a big second half of the season, with Champions League glory and league cup glory (the Subway and the FA Cup) in their sights. Having every player available is a massive boost. Before her injury, WÃ¤lti was having a great run. She gave her all, and alongside Kim Little and Frida Maanum, our engine room played its best football ever.
Will WÃ¤lti make the Arsenal vs. Bristol City FA Cup matchday squad on January 12th? Thatâ€™s something weâ€™ll have to wait and see.
